PackageOracle.name: DA_RESOURCE_ORDER_ITEM
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_RESOURCE_ORDER_ITEM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.14.716511000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,request_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,resource_specification_id IN NUMBER
,resource_id IN VARCHAR2
,item_qty IN NUMBER
,item_action_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,request_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,resource_specification_id IN NUMBER
,resource_id IN VARCHAR2
,item_qty IN NUMBER
,item_action_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,resource_order_item_id IN NUMBER
,request_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,resource_specification_id IN NUMBER
,resource_id IN VARCHAR2
,item_qty IN NUMBER
,item_action_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,resource_order_item_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_resource_order_item;

body.name: DA_RESOURCE_ORDER_ITEM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_RESOURCE_ORDER_ITEM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.14.728597000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,request_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,resource_specification_id IN NUMBER
,resource_id IN VARCHAR2
,item_qty IN NUMBER
,item_action_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_resource_order_item.add(fx), parms=' || request_interaction_id || '|' || resource_specification_id || '|' || resource_id || '|' || item_qty || '|' || item_action_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_resource_order_item a
(
a.resource_order_item_id
,a.request_interaction_id
,a.resource_specification_id
,a.resource_id
,a.item_qty
,a.item_action_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_resource_order_item_id.NEXTVAL
,add.request_interaction_id
,add.resource_specification_id
,add.resource_id
,add.item_qty
,add.item_action_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.resource_order_item_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_resource_order_item.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,request_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,resource_specification_id IN NUMBER
,resource_id IN VARCHAR2
,item_qty IN NUMBER
,item_action_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_resource_order_item.add, parms=' || request_interaction_id || '|' || resource_specification_id || '|' || resource_id || '|' || item_qty || '|' || item_action_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_resource_order_item a
(
a.resource_order_item_id
,a.request_interaction_id
,a.resource_specification_id
,a.resource_id
,a.item_qty
,a.item_action_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_resource_order_item_id.NEXTVAL
,add.request_interaction_id
,add.resource_specification_id
,add.resource_id
,add.item_qty
,add.item_action_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_resource_order_item.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,resource_order_item_id IN NUMBER
,request_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,resource_specification_id IN NUMBER
,resource_id IN VARCHAR2
,item_qty IN NUMBER
,item_action_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_resource_order_item.add, parms=' || resource_order_item_id || '|' || request_interaction_id || '|' || resource_specification_id || '|' || resource_id || '|' || item_qty || '|' || item_action_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_resource_order_item a
(
a.resource_order_item_id
,a.request_interaction_id
,a.resource_specification_id
,a.resource_id
,a.item_qty
,a.item_action_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.resource_order_item_id
,add.request_interaction_id
,add.resource_specification_id
,add.resource_id
,add.item_qty
,add.item_action_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_resource_order_item.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,resource_order_item_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_resource_order_item.del, parms=' || resource_order_item_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_resource_order_item a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.resource_order_item_id = del.resource_order_item_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_resource_order_item.del');

END del;

END da_resource_order_item;
